column1: Electrical Power and Control Engineering MSc
column5: Gain IET accreditation on LJMU's Electrical Power and Control Engineering MSc.This course is available to study full-time or part-time.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full-time, 2 years part-time. 20 month full-time option also available.
